alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 4:52PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lane County through 515 PM PDT... At 452 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vida, or 19 miles south of Sweet Home, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vida and Leaburg. In Oregon this includes State Highway 126 from Eugene to McKenzie Bridge between mile markers 17 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
